title: [NA][EAST][Silver] Looking for Support and Jungler (15+)
body:
Comment your IGN, Age, Role, and Champs you play w/ your role. More Info down below.

For both Support and Jungler you must play meta champs. 15 years or older and mature (not being hyper and obnoxious). What we are looking for in a Jungler, ganking w/ asking (when a lane is asking for help you are doing something wrong and saying AFK Farming is not a good excuse because RIP Devourer), for a support you will have to speak with the ADC on the champs but mainly Fresh, Morgana, Soraka, and any other CC champion. If you are good support and we will know because he will get a lot of kills (he will also successfully get first blood if you are a good support).

replies.body:
"(he will also successfully get first blood if you are a good support)." 

A joke?

Ign: 404 HP Not Found

Age:16

Role: Support 

Champions: {{champion:267}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:43}}

I am more focused on peel for my adc then anything. I play semi-passively and  enjoy playing healing supports but can do tanks.

IGN: Holygoober
Age: 25
Role: Support / ADC
Champ Pool: {{champion:412}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:432}} 

Notes for gameplay: As support I usually will play ahead of my ADC and look for an opportunity to throw some form of crowd control at enemy players. Depending on how far ahead or behind we are, usually also affects how aggressive or passive I am overall. Depends on the others as well, not just myself.

IGN: LilPeeWizzle
Age: 18 as of this saturday
Role: I main Support
Champion Pool: I Main Thresh "NickNamed - SadLife" {{champion:412}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:111}} 
Also the thing about first blood, I see myself as a Great Thresh and i will get him a level 2 first blood with ignite easily unless the lanes a counter for us then it may take a level or two longer     http://www.lolking.net/summoner/na/56742305#profile
i was silver the reset put me at Bronze 5 now im just having time off of work to play and get to silver again.



http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=lilpeewizzle

also look there if you want to see my games where i mostly go over 30 assist

IGN: loogie
Age: 19
Role: I queue Support primary, Jungle secondary in soloq so 
Champs with Support: Thresh, Nami, Braum, Alistar, Soraka 
Champs with Jungle: Kindred, Gragas, Elise, Rengar, Lee Sin
Note for Champs: if a specific champ is needed for a certain comp, I usually have a learning curve of 1-2 days in which I can be ready to play that champ at a comprehensive level.

Sup Main, not a smurf but add me if you at least want to try out a couple games. Always willing to learn as well.

na.op.gg/summoner/userName=9tt2
